title: Guerilla Marketing
introDescription: Boost your project’s brand social presence with X8C's guerilla marketing on various platforms like Twitter, Telegram, Discord, Reddit, and/or 4chan. Build awareness, create noise on prominent socials, and amplify engagement with our team's help.
processDescription: The process of creating your marketing strategy will vary depending on your specific goals and needs, however these are some of the steps you can expect us to take:

processList.label: Operational Standards
processList.text: To ensure that your marketing efforts run smoothly and all deliverables are met, we will align on the operational standards and decide on the number of platforms that will be utilised.

processList.label: Setting the Bar
processList.text: Before starting any project, it is crucial to establish clear key performance indicators (KPIs). This will ensure that everyone knows what is expected of them and that your project’s marketing is moving in the right direction.

processList.label: Narratives
processList.text: A compelling narrative is essential for any successful promotion. Our GM team will work with you to create a narrative that aligns with your brand and resonates with your target audience.

processList.label: Campaigning for Results
processList.text: After the narrative has been defined, we will be launching tailor-made campaigns. This will ensure that your project is moving forward and results are being generated.

processList.label: Daily Check-ins
processList.text: It is essential to keep up with the progress of your project on a daily basis. We will be checking metrics, Medium content, Twitter profile, CoinGecko/CoinMarketCap pages, and any other relevant platforms around the clock.

processList.label: Collaboration & Communication
processList.text: Our team will share observations and feedback on a daily basis, and discuss narratives, suggestions, and any questions in detail on the sync-up calls.
